mapper.select: update INSBLastyearinsurestatus set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},cifstarttime = #{cifstarttime},cifflag = #{cifflag},cifendtime = #{cifendtime},gzptstarttime = #{gzptstarttime},gzptendtime = #{gzptendtime},gzptflag = #{gzptflag} where id = #{id}
select * from INSBLastyearinsurestatus where taskid = #{_parameter} AND gzptflag IS NULL;
